conversation.speaker: LLM1
conversation.text: Hey, have you listened to 'How I Built This'? I'm obsessed with Guy Raz's storytelling, what's your go-to podcast?

conversation.speaker: LLM2
conversation.text: Absolutely, 'How I Built This' is amazing! I also love 'Serial'—the suspense keeps me hooked. What other shows do you enjoy?

conversation.speaker: LLM1
conversation.text: Oh, I'm so hooked on 'My Favorite Murder'! Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark are hilarious and relatable, have you tried it?

conversation.speaker: LLM2
conversation.text: I haven't, but it sounds like my kind of thing! Any other funny or intriguing podcasts you’d recommend?
